name: UBX-NAV-TIMEBDS
description: This message reports the precise BDS time of the most recent navigation solution including validity flags and an accuracy estimate.

fields.name: iTOW
fields.description: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch. See section iTOW timestamps in the integration manual for details.

fields.name: SOW
fields.description: BDS time of week (rounded to seconds)

fields.name: fSOW
fields.description: Fractional part of SOW (range: +/-500000000). The precise BDS time of week in seconds is: SOW + fSOW * 1e-9

fields.name: week
fields.description: BDS week number of the navigation epoch

fields.name: valid
fields.description: Validity Flags (bitmask): bit 0 = sowValid (1 = Valid SOW and fSOW); bit 1 = weekValid (1 = Valid week); bit 2 = leapSValid (1 = Valid leap second)
